text: Thank you for pointing out that example in the repo, I agree that this is not ideal. We should not be using something undocumented in our examples, we should either be ensuring it gets documented (which then means we have to be concious of avoiding breaking it) or document an alternative solution like the CD one.

Reminder: Don’t forget to keep your HubSpot CLI up to date to ensure you have the latest CLI features, bug/usability fixes and performance improvements. • <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/developer-reference/local-development-cli#upgrade|How to upgrade your CLI to the latest version>.

Hello Community! Is there a way to get a full DEV environment of a HubSpot site running? I already know the sandbox feature, but as far as i know there is only the option to sync files from the design manager like templates, modules but no pages, HubDB etc. Are there any articles about it? Thank you!
